Tom

I have a tanto that looks to be signed Nio Kiyomune (not the easiest t=
o read) , it is in shirasaya with sayagaki by Kawaguchi Noburo, the sayagak=
i says the sword is Nio Kiyomune and Bunmei era, sayagaki  is dated 1937 (i=
 think, will have to check)........ anyway, Kiyomune is an obscure smith, b=
ut i thought there might be a slight chance this sword may have been in one=
 of his books -- i was thinking that if he had the sword in his possession =
he may have taken an oshigata and as he was publishing reference books in t=
hat period maybe he included it...

If anyone does have any info on this sm=
ith, or a reference oshigata i would appreciate any help

Mark  Jones
